report.title: Locations list
report.description: A general purpose list of locations.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms ttl1 JOIN terms tinput ON tinput.id=ttl1.term_id JOIN termlists_terms ttl2 ON ttl2.meaning_id=ttl1.meaning_id JOIN terms t ON t.id=ttl2.term_id ) ON ttl1.id=l.location_type_id #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND l.location_type_id=#location_type_id# AND st_distance(boundary_geom, st_transform(st_geomfromtext('#near#', 4326), 900913))<25000 #idlist# #order_by#

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of location IDs to filter to.
